passages.text:
You enter and encounter a frail, frizzy haired woman doggedly scrubbing her hands.  Her eyes appear slightly sunken, an obvious tell of her intense fatigue. 

[[C->Glares]]
passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Frail Woman::...

Frail Woman::Oh, you must mean the Western Residential Distric.  It's hard to keep up with the slang these days.  

[[Continue->Signed In]]
passages.name: p:I came in through the sewer.

passages.text:
Frail Woman::Miss, I have a key.  All infirmary employees do.  

Frail Woman::And you should have had to sign in before you were allowed here, so I'm a little alarmed you slipped through without anyone noticing.  

Frail Woman::I'll have to have a few words with whoever is on shift about this oversight.

Jasper,thinking::"On shift?"  No one has worked here in decades...

[[Continue->Signed In]]
passages.name: p:How did *you* get through the front desk, huh?

passages.text:
Frail Woman::In any case, we've really got to get you signed in.  You should have been primed on how to enter discretely.  

Frail Woman::Follow me to the front desk, we'll quietly get you recorded and we can move into the maternity ward.

[[You want me to sign in?  Look at the state of this place!]]
[[p:Hold on, who are you?]]

links.name: You want me to sign in?  Look at the state of this place!
links.link: You want me to sign in?  Look at the state of this place!

passages.name: Signed In

passages.text:
Frail Woman::You might have come in for an under the table operation, but we still need to go through the motions of signing you in and recording your visit.  

Frail Woman::Wouldn't it be odd if countless unaccompanied women came in and out at all hours with no proper documentation of their visits?

Jasper,thinking::I get it now.  She thinks you're here for something seedy.  Something "under the table."

Jasper,sad::She's right about that, but she doesn't know why we're really here.  What does she think is going on?

[[Continue->Signed In]]
passages.name: You want me to sign in?  Look at the state of this place!

passages.text:
Frail Woman::My name is Julia.  I've been a midwife at this infirmary for nine years.  You are in good hands.

Julia's presence is strange and unnatural.  Her cadence and gestures seem disconnected from the present scene.  

The sublingual signals she's sending you via gesticulations and body language are distorted and inscrutable, as if transmitted through a television set overcome with static.

[[Have you taken a look around recently?  This infirmary clearly hasn't been operational for a long time.]]
[[What kind of operation am I signing up for?]]
[[What do you do here?]]
[[p:If we go get "signed in," will you take me to the maternity ward?]]

links.name: Have you taken a look around recently?  This infirmary clearly hasn't been operational for a long time.
links.link: Have you taken a look around recently?  This infirmary clearly hasn't been operational for a long time.

links.name: What kind of operation am I signing up for?
links.link: What kind of operation am I signing up for?

links.name: p:If we go get "signed in," will you take me to the maternity ward?
links.link: p:If we go get "signed in," will you take me to the maternity ward?

passages.name: p:Hold on, who are you?

passages.text:
Julia::That's ridiculous.

Her dismissal of the suggestion is visible.  She immediately twitches her head quickly to the left, physically signaling her rejection of the notion.

Julia::Look, we're doing the best we can in light of the recent expansion.  Our budget wasn't inflated enough to keep up.  I assure you though, you will still receive top notch care, for both official and unofficial matters. 

Julia::Now let's go fill out your record.

Jasper,twisted::An excess of active patients doesn't seem to be the issue here.

[[Continue->p:Hold on, who are you?]]
passages.name: Have you taken a look around recently?  This infirmary clearly hasn't been operational for a long time.

passages.text:
Julia::I'm a midwife.  That's not exactly the technical title for my position, but that's what I am - I guide women through the pain of birth.

Julia::But as you're aware, I've also taken on a number of other responsibilities.

[[Continue->p:Hold on, who are you?]]
passages.name: What do you do here?

passages.text:
Julia::Look, I expect you have some anxieties going into this, but we really cannot discuss them here.  We'll talk about it in private, later, after sign in.

Jasper,twisted::She expects us to know what she's talking about, so just go along with it for now.  

[[Continue->p:Hold on, who are you?]]
passages.name: What kind of operation am I signing up for?

passages.text:
Frail Woman::No, you didn't.  I would have gotten a few alert taps through the telegrammatic lines, and prepared to meet you in the inspection room instead of here.  

Frail Woman::I don't typically introduce myself to patients while washing stained rags.

Jasper,surprised::For what it's worth, those rags look pretty clean.  

[[Continue->Signed In]]
passages.name: p:(Lie) I did come in past the front desk.

passages.text:
Julia::I *have* to take you to the maternity ward, Miss.  That's where you were supposed to sign in.

Julia::Why did you come through the administrative wing?  You shouldn't be here at all.

[[p:I need to find proof that I was born here.]]
[[p:This hospital has secrets, about my past.  I aim to figure them out, serial adventure boy detective style.]]
[[p:It's a personal matter.]]

links.name: p:I need to find proof that I was born here.
links.link: p:I need to find proof that I was born here.

links.name: p:This hospital has secrets, about my past.  I aim to figure them out, serial adventure boy detective style.
links.link: p:This hospital has secrets, about my past.  I aim to figure them out, serial adventure boy detective style.

passages.name: p:If we go get "signed in," will you take me to the maternity ward?

passages.text:
Julia::That's absurd.  The maternity ward has only been in operation for 19 years.  You look a little older than that to me.

Jasper,looking_forward::See?  You look old.

Jasper,thinking::I keep telling you to wear more sunblock and smoke less but you won't listen.

Jasper,sad::She probably thinks you're ugly too.

[[p:Cut it out!]]
[[p:I'm not ugly, you're ugly!->p:Cut it out!]]
passages.name: p:I need to find proof that I was born here.

passages.text:
Julia::...Let's get you signed in.  I'll need to check your patient record but I suspect you might need a few refills, in addition to our other services.

Jasper,twisted::"Refills."  Medication refills.  She's making fun of you.

[[Continue->This will get me closer]]
passages.name: p:This hospital has secrets, about my past.  I aim to figure them out, serial adventure boy detective style.

passages.text:
Julia::I...understand.

Julia::I'll...I'll get you into the maternity ward.  But we're going to have to go through the front desk, no way around it.

Jasper,head_tilted::I think she wants to help, but also wants to keep the rule bending to a minimum.  Though I'm not sure who enforces the "rules" these days.

[[Continue->This will get me closer]]
passages.name: p:It's a personal matter.

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Look, something is obviously wrong with Julia.  She seems to think this hospital is still operational.  

Jasper,looking_forward::But if you just go along with her for now, maybe she'll actually get us to the maternity ward.  She acts like she knows her way around at least. 

Julia wrings the last drops of water off of her hands.  She subtly turns to face the doorframe, motioning for you to follow her.
passages.name: This will get me closer

passages.text:
Julia::I'm sorry, miss? 

Jasper,looking_forward::Zip it, we'll hash this out later.

[[Continue->This will get me closer]]
passages.name: p:Cut it out!

passages.text:
The woman rises from the pail to address you.

Frail Woman::Excuse me, miss.  You shouldn't be here.

Frail Woman::You should have checked in at the front desk, every patient should before being allowed past the foyer.

Frail Woman::I know some of our services are more discreet in nature, but we still need to go through the proper channels and have you signed in.

Frail Woman::How did you even get here?  You shouldn't have made it past the front desk without security being alerted.

Jasper,thinking::Why does she care which entrance we came through?  This place has been abandoned for twenty years.

Frail Woman::Well?  Miss, I really need to know.

[[p:I came in through the sewer.]]
[[p:(Lie) I did come in past the front desk.]]
[[p:How did *you* get through the front desk, huh?]]

links.link: p:I came in through the sewer.

links.name: p:(Lie) I did come in past the front desk.
links.link: p:(Lie) I did come in past the front desk.

links.name: p:How did *you* get through the front desk, huh?
links.link: p:How did *you* get through the front desk, huh?

passages.name: Rises

passages.text:
She glares at you, intensely.  Her expression reveals her view of you, painfully clearly: You are an intrusion, a foreign body.

Jasper,head_tilted::Who is this?  There shouldn't be anyone else here.

Jasper,looking_forward::Let's carefully introduce ourselves.  Be prepared to run if you sense a threat.

[[C->Rises]]
passages.name: Glares
